short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights threads that contain under 100 comments. Toggle with ~ key.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple plugin that highlights Reddit threads that have fewer than 100 comments.  Use the ~ key to toggle highlighting on and off.  Updated to work with New and Old Reddit alike.  (Option to use Q as toggle key like Version 1.0).  You can send feedback to @Clayburn on Twitter.
